name: StarfireAffirmations
0:
”Alexa open Starfire Affirmations”
”Alexa, open Starfire Affirmations and ask for help”
”Alexa, ask Starfire Affirmations to give positive affirmations”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: starfire affirmations
des:
Starfire Affirmations skill provides daily uplifting, positive thought for you to take throughout the day. 

What are affirmations?
Affirmations are sentences aimed to affect the conscious and the subconscious mind. The words that combine to create the affirmation, automatically and involuntarily, bring up related mental images into the mind, which could inspire, energize and motivate. Repeating affirmations, and the resultant mental images, affect the subconscious mind, which in turn, influences the behavior, habits, actions and reactions.

The first step is enabling the skill. Then, this skill works by allowing you to ask Alexa for an affirmation and Alexa will provide you with a positive phrase to take with you throughout the day. When you need a reminder, as you go through out your day, you can go the Alexa companion app to see the affirmation that you received that day. 

There are more than 10,000 affirmations to choose from and more being added every single day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
